meanings.sent1: The thistliest field was prickly to walk through.
meanings.sent2: The gardener avoided the thistliest areas when planting flowers.
meanings.sent3: The thistliest patch of grass made the sheep think twice before grazing there.
meanings.sent4: Her thistliest personality trait was her sharp wit.
meanings.sent5: The thistliest cactus in the desert stood out with its spiky appearance.

meanings.sent1: The thistliest plant in the garden had the most thorns.
meanings.sent2: The thistliest bush in the forest provided a home for many insects.
meanings.sent3: The thistliest hedgehog won the 'spikiest animal' award.
meanings.sent4: His thistliest jacket was covered in tiny thorns.
meanings.sent5: The thistliest crown on the king's head symbolized his power and protection.
